item.title: Video editor needed for TikTok/YouTube short videos of people appealing for help in Gaza - Upwork
item.description:
Hello Everyone

GetMoreDonations is a performance based agency based in Boca Raton Florida that specializes in helping out non profit organizations with fundraising for charities. Our goal is to help as many people as possible that are in dire need of our help.

Just to give you an idea, we have helped tens of thousands of families in places such as Yemen, Syria, and even assisted the homeless in NYC.

We are looking for a solid video editor that can help us make emotional stories by editing found-footage and news clips.

Here is an example of a video we found:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OSdddzjkzpM

This is how the video should be edited after (Here is an example of how we edited it):

https://youtu.be/ceRU9EMknsU

Basically when you edit these videos they need to show the most emotional part of the refugees story and then get people to donate as quickly as possible.

You must have experience editing videos. Facebook and Youtube ads experience a big plus. You must be competent and able to retell emotional stories by editing found-footage and news clips. You must speak good/fluent english for proper communication, know terms such as "L Cut" , and be able to complete projects within specified deadlines.  When applying please send examples of what videos you have edited in the past.

If you meet our requirements, then this will be for a full time, long term position.  With your help, we can help expand our goal to help 1,000,000 people in less than a year.

To learn more about us, please visit getmoredonations.com

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 04:06 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Audio Editing, Explainer Video
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Audio Editing, Explainer Video
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for "How To" Product videos for FB and IG Ads - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled Video Editor to transform raw product videos into engaging "How To" videos to be used as Facebook and Instagram Ads. The ideal candidate will have experience in editing and storytelling to create compelling content.

Background:
We produce and sell electric backpacking stoves. The technology differs from traditional gas-powered backpacking stoves, and so creating "how to" content is critical to educating prospective customers on the value of our product.

What we're looking for:
We are looking to make a few 10-30 second video Ads for use on Facebook and Instagram (in vertical, square, and horizontal orientations). We have created some raw video content to be used (and are open to taking more videos to be used at the editor's recommendation). This project requires taking the raw footage and turning it into high-quality videos with a clear and concise storyline (we would love to collaborate with you on this). The editor will need to enhance the visuals, splice together multiple clips, add appropriate audio and text overlays, create smooth transitions, etc. Attention to detail and creativity are essential to ensure the videos are informative and visually appealing.

We would like to start by having you create 1 ad set (x1 vertical, x1 square, x1 horizontal), with the potential to be re-hired for future ad sets as well.

Skills required:
    - Video editing
    - Storytelling
    - Visual enhancement
    - Sound effects
    - Transition effects

If you have a passion for turning raw footage into engaging content and possess the necessary skills, we would love to hear from you.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 04:02 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Short Video Ad, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Explainer Video
Skills: Short Video Ad, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Explainer Video
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Animator/Video Editor for Gym Competition - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented animator/video editor to create an engaging and dynamic video for a gym competition. The video will showcase the competition from locations to movement videos. The ideal candidate should have a strong portfolio demonstrating skills in animation and video editing. Attention to detail and the ability to bring ideas to life through visual storytelling is crucial. The video should be high quality, visually appealing, and able to captivate the audience.
    Skills required:
    - Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or DaVinci Resolve
    - Experience in motion graphics and animation
    - Ability to creatively use visual effects and transitions
    - Knowledge of audio editing and sound design
    - Strong storytelling and narrative skills
    - Excellent time management and organizational skills
    Size: medium
    Duration: under 1 month
    Expertise: intermediate

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 27, 2024 03:59 UTC
Category: Cartoons & Comics
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Motion Graphics, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Motion Graphics, Video Post-Editing
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Alex Hormozi Style Video Editor Needed For Coaching Business - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a talented video editor to edit our videos.

Must have outstanding standards in the quality and output of their work

Must be highly organised to get more work done and be extremely productive with their time and resources to add more value

Must take inspiration from, and model content from leaders in the personal development industry such as Alex Hormozi, Tony Robbins, Gary Vaynerchuk, Grant Cardone etc... and how they produce content on their different social channels

Deliverables for repurposing of content to be the following:

Edit and create final video – minor editing to remove silence at the start and end, add
intro/outro video stingers (if any). Add an opening thumbnail and a closing call to
action image
• 2 square social media teaser videos (less than 60 seconds) – short, branded and professional looking
teaser videos from the main video. Created in square format for Facebook, Instagram, and
LinkedIn – create and burn captions onto these teaser videos
• 3 vertical video teasers for Instagram and Facebook Stories – similar to above but in vertical
format and less than 45 seconds (3 “Stories”). N.B. If the video isn’t long enough to get 3 x 45s
extracted videos (whilst still making sense) create shorter Stories e.g. 3x 15s
• 4 additional Stories graphics related to the video topic, designed and posted for engagement
– e.g. a poll, a question, a ratings slider
• 2 social media graphics per platform (6 in total) - 2 different social media graphic designs
created in formats for Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn – a title image and a
quote/question image (that can also be used on website in the blog post)
• Artwork/blog post image - for the blog post on website
• Blog post – an SEO focused article, based on video, that can be used as a standalone
piece of content as well as published on website/blog with the video

• Instagram Stories – 7 days per week - 3 video teasers, 4 engagement posts / graphics
• Instagram main feed – 4 days per week - 2 square videos, 2 graphics
• LinkedIn – 4 days per week – main edited video, 1 square video and 2 graphics
• Facebook – 4 days per week - main edited video, 1 square video, 2 graphics

Here are examples of videos we did before:

https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8pv4MRoH0F/?igsh=dDQ0enVvczAyaDFk

Hourly Range: $6.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 03:41 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Post-Editing, Video Editing, Instagram Story, Instagram, Facebook
Skills: Video Post-Editing, Video Editing, Instagram Story, Instagram, Facebook
Country: United Arab Emirates
click to apply

item.title: customer service video Recorder for YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
**Read Carefully***
We are looking for an individual with a clear English accent to assist us in recording videos for our YouTube channel. The selected candidate will be responsible for using their own computer to record high-quality videos that align with our content requirements. The videos will be focused on various topics related to our channel's niche. As an ideal candidate, you should have a strong command of the English language, excellent communication skills, and the ability to deliver engaging content. This is a great opportunity for individuals who enjoy being in front of the camera and are passionate about creating captivating video content.

Skills:
- Clear English accent
- Excellent communication skills
- Proficient in video recording/editing tools

Size: Small
Duration: Under 1 month
Expertise: Entry

**********To apply:  
Record a video of yourself using https://www.loom.com/   answering the questions below and share the link with us.  
-Tell us about yourself and your work experience
-Do you have a good camera presence
-What's your experience using technology tools like PowerPoint,  ChatGPT,  Canva?
-What are things that interest you?   
-Why should we hire you?
-Why do you want this job?  
-Explain how you feel like you can help us achieve our goal.

Hourly Range: $3.00-$5.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 03:35 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Voice-Over, Video Production, Customer Service, Sales Call, YouTube, Explainer Video, Customer Care
Skills: Voice-Over, Video Production, Customer Service, Sales Call, YouTube, Explainer Video, Customer Care
Country: United States
click to apply
